Posts.EditableText: It came up in my QuestComp entry that I needed to be able to assign a possessive pronoun to characters that could be either male or female, so I added the <possessive> attribute to default object, male, and female types, and added the appropriate templates to support it.  The modified libraries are included in case anyone else wants to use them.
Posts.HTML:
It came up in my QuestComp entry that I needed to be able to assign a possessive pronoun to characters that could be either male or female, so I added the <possessive> attribute to default object, male, and female types, and added the appropriate templates to support it. The modified libraries are included in case anyone else wants to use them.
English.aslx
CoreTypes.aslx
